plot outline: LOGLINE: After their music mogul patriarch dies, an embattled Santa Clarita family employs Craigslist misfits to start up a live-stream channel. REFERENCES: "The Office" and "Friends" meets "Love and Hip-Hop." CONCEPT: This Twitch Channel original streaming series is a semi-scripted improv half-hour comedy. GENRE: Live-Action Single-Camera Comedy The series has elements of dramedy and a production style that marries scripted teleplay with the improv techniques of Meisner and live theater.
title: Upstart
plot: _Upstart_ (qv) is the story of a start-up live stream channel, and the characters who work there.

LOGLINE: After their music mogul patriarch dies, an embattled Santa Clarita family employs Craigslist misfits to start up a live-stream channel. REFERENCES: "The Office" and "Friends" meets "Love and Hip-Hop." CONCEPT: This Twitch Channel original streaming series is a semi-scripted improv half-hour comedy. GENRE: Live-Action Single-Camera Comedy The series has elements of dramedy and a production style that marries scripted teleplay with the improv techniques of Meisner and live theater.::Tanya Young, Executive Producer/ Head Writer
